item.title: Defence Alliance 2 1.6 announced!
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
Well, what can we say. Within ten days we had about 4500 downloads which is pretty good morale boost.

DA2 1.5 is running very well on about 3 or 4 servers that usually bring some people in. Of course, we do need more players so anyone you know that could promote our mod let us know!

The good part: Defence Alliance 2 Version 1.6 is true! We know we said 1.5 would be the last one but we lied. That's because of you!

Post in our...

Defence Alliance 2 1.6 announced!

item.title: Defence Alliance ? - Recruiting
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dest)
item.dc:creator: Dest
item.content:encoded:
We have began on a new project, for Red Orchestra: Ostfront!.

In order to succeed, we need your help in our art department!

We are looking for experienced programmers, leveldesigners, animators, modelers which can create high quality weapons, vehicles, buildings and/or character with UV map.
and 2d artists for high quality concept arts, textures and skins.


If you want to join, and work on our very exciting new project, post your a small...

Defence Alliance ? - Recruiting

item.title: DA 1.1 hopefully soon and last release!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dest)
item.dc:creator: Dest
item.content:encoded:
I have sad news to report for you DA fans,
Due personal issues and motivation problems, DA 1.1 is having an hard time to release. I can't say when its coming, but we are intending to release the IGF version (most probably with some map updates) that was submitted for the competition last month.


Update2:

The IGF announcment is getting near! So is version 1.1! When we do get a finalist position in the IGF competition, we will most probably be making an version 1.2 to promote at the...

DA 1.1 hopefully soon and last release!

item.title: DA 1.1 Media Update
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dest)
item.dc:creator: Dest
item.content:encoded:
After that bit of sad and confusing news, here are some screenshots of DA1.1 in current state. It shows new as well as edited maps and the effect the EMP does on turrets and ofcourse the new turret is showing its skills!

Enjoy!

[SCREENSHOT]http://www.home.versatel.nl/waverstr13/Shot00016.jpg[/SCREENSHOT][SCREENSHOT]http://www.home.versatel.nl/waverstr13/Shot00024.JPG[/SCREENSHOT]...

DA 1.1 Media Update

item.title: New DA Site launching soon
item.author: invalid@example.com (FluXs)
item.dc:creator: FluXs
item.content:encoded:
We got a new site to go with the launch of DA2 coming soon, It has more or less the same content as the current site, but is a lot more tidy

Its also in Flash but a html version will also be provided.

I got some sneak peak shots for you here, and soon i will be putting up a test version for people to test and report back any errors before it goes live.

item.title: More Mirrors Added
item.author: invalid@example.com (FluXs)
item.dc:creator: FluXs
item.content:encoded:
More mirrors have been added to the homepage today, so now is even a better and quicker time to download DA2

www.planetunreal.com/da

item.title: Ready ? Get the mod:
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bytekeeper)
item.dc:creator: Bytekeeper
item.content:encoded:
As of NOW you can download the mod here:

http://www.fileplanet.com/mod_center.shtml

Update

DA2 is out NOW!

http://www.planetunreal.com/da for mirrors and info!

item.title: Defence Alliance 2 - I want to party for 7 days...
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
Enough is enough this is the time to announce our official release date for everyone!

Official Release date: October 7th, 2005
IRC Party time: September 30th - October 7th (Seven days!)

You can login to irc and use this information
Server: irc.gamesurge.net
Channel : #da

Idle or express your opinion about DA2! Spam is NOT welcome until the mod is released!

item.title: Defence Alliance 2 - Last internal release!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bytekeeper)
item.dc:creator: Bytekeeper
item.content:encoded:
The thing you're all waiting for is closing in. A last step before it's finally done is the new internal release. And now I'll do a thing you also all like: 2 weeks!!

NOW is the right time to join us in our forums and talk with us and the beta testers about the mod.
If you want to see live progress and talk, join our IRC channel #da on the GameSurge network....

Defence Alliance 2 - Last internal release!

item.title: Defence Alliance 2 - Servers/Mirrors Requested
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
Approaching our release we are currently looking for anyone who can host a DA2 server or mirror of our files.

This is your chance to get to play DA2 earlier than everyone if you provide one of the two services!

Read the requirements here.

Defence Alliance 2 Beta 1.0 weighs about 105mb, includes some ECE bonus pack files. Please note, you will not be required to download ECE bonus pack. Installer will...

Defence Alliance 2 - Servers/Mirrors Requested

item.title: Defence Alliance 2 - Official Release Information
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
We have been in serious discussion as a team regarding to how our release is going to be handled. However, some final decisions have been made.

At first, we will not announce an official release date until the mod is complete. We do not want to claim that we can be ready at any given date and then something comes up and we fail to deliver.

Secondly, Defence Alliance 2 will be a FilePlanet exclusive in the beginning. However, it will only last for three (3) days and not a week we...

Defence Alliance 2 - Official Release Information

item.title: Defence Alliance 2 - Release schedule resumed!
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
Well, after a long break of summer for most of our time we are back on track to release DA2.

We are in the process of completing our GUI system that is totally custom and will make the game look and feel better.

The team has probably decided to firstly release Defence Alliance 2 Beta 1 under the fileplanet exclusive section and then a week after a full public release.

We will be releasing more info soon!

item.title: Defence Alliance 2 - Official Trailer
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
We would like to inform that the official DA2 trailer is now available for download. The trailer shows off some of the action within 3 maps. The trailer lasts about one minute and its available in high and low quality quicktime format (MOV). More format types such as DivX will soon be available.

As the release of DA2 Beta 1 approaches we would like to thank everyone for supporting us.

Download official trailer here
.

item.title: Defence Alliance 2 - Beta Testing begins!
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
The Defence Alliance 2 Team would like to announce that we will be looking for 10 beta-testers to test our latest build (Internal Release 6). If you are a big fan of DA2 this is finally your chance to be selected and play DA2!

Please note that this does not mean the mod is completed or it will be released out soon. We still need to do a variety of things before we release Beta 1 to the public.

Also, IR6 is not yet available to our team members but we are trying to get organized...

Defence Alliance 2 - Beta Testing begins!

item.title: MAYA Animator required.
item.author: invalid@example.com (DA|aBsOlUt)
item.dc:creator: DA|aBsOlUt
item.content:encoded:
The DA2 team is currently looking for an animator in Maya. We are looking for a small number of character and weapon animations. Our models are already rigged and ready to be used.

People who apply must include:

  • Strong animation skills to match the already high quality animations DA2 includes.
  • Work well in a good team environment.
  • Direct communication available (MSN, ICQ, AIM).
  • Modelling skills are also appreciated.

Email us at...

MAYA Animator required.

item.title: Media Updates from DA2 - IR5 Sooooooooon :P
item.author: invalid@example.com (FluXs)
item.dc:creator: FluXs
item.content:encoded:
Just a general announcement that we hope to be releasing a lot of content for DA2 soon following our IR5 release. So stay tuned in the next few weeks.

I hope to also update the website with more info such as Alliance Marine classes, weapons, ingame shots, wallpapers and videos.

item.title: Vote for DA:UT and DA2 !
item.author: invalid@example.com (FluXs)
item.dc:creator: FluXs
item.content:encoded:
Vote for DA:UT as Mod of the year or best action mod
http://mods.moddb.com/201/

Vote for DA2 as best upcomming Mod or any other category you wish such as best website!
http://mods.moddb.com/238/


*You need to be signed in to vote.... do the right thing!

item.title: Late DA2 Updates
item.author: invalid@example.com (spec_x)
item.dc:creator: spec_x
item.content:encoded:
Sorry all, this post is a tad bit late, but I've been rather busy

Work on DA has been going by quite smoothly lately and we've added quite a bit.

Fluxs has been hard at work like always working on the intro map a bit more making some tweaks, and I'm assuming getting some work on dragonfly done

[D] finally got his new monitor and I believe is or at least will be starting on Ruin2 soon.

I've been working on crash some more and have posted some new screenshots...

Late DA2 Updates

item.title: DA2 Updates
item.author: invalid@example.com (spec_x)
item.dc:creator: spec_x
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone, seems to be time for another update!

Things are still chugging along like usual. Work is being done on the GUI and it's coming along nicely. Our custom loading screens are in and working perfectly, really adds a nice touch

[D] is starting working on ruins2, so we're looking foreward to that.

Fluxs is working on various things at the moment, hopfully some more news on that soon for you all.

Abs is studying up on more code and will be working on some cool stuff...

DA2 Updates
